info.title: ScanSan - Go Area Codes API
info.description:
API for fetching data for a relevant area

Resources:
- [Postcode Formatting](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Postcodes_in_the_United_Kingdom#Structure,_Formatting_and_Validation)

> [!note]
> Most endpoints do not check for the existence of a postcode or district,
but just checks the format. To check if the place exists use the area_codes search endpoint

tags.name: Area Code
tags.description: {area_codes} is either 1 postcode or 1 postcode district

get.description:
Get a list of areacodes/postcodes, localities/boroughs, wards and
streets for a given area, where each array element is grouped by the
postcode district.

Valid inputs:
- full postcodes
- postcode district
- street names
- place names

The highest granularity is the street name, not the postcode.

Valid Parameters:
(area_name) OR (gbr_district AND gbr_street)

parameters.name: gbr_street
parameters.description: A GBR street within the specified postcode district

404.description: Search term is not an area or does not exist in the database

get.description:
Summary returns the following counts and prices ranges:
  - Total properties
  - Sold price range in the past 5 years
  - Current valuation range
  - Current rent listings
  - Current sale listings

  For the given {area_code}

404.description: Given {area_code} does not exist in the database.

get.description:
Get Rent Listings for the given *area_code*.

> [!note]
> Listings for a postcode rely on addreses matching, and will typically
result in few or no results

404.description: Given {area_code} does not have any associated rent listing data, or {area_code} does not exist in the database.

get.description:
Get Sale Listings for the given *area_code*.

> [!note]
> Listings for a postcode rely on addreses matching, and will typically
result in few or no results

404.description: Given {area_code} does not have any associated sale listing data, or {area_code} does not exist in the database.

get.description: Gets most up-to-date energy performance data for properties for a given *area_code_postal*.   If a property has an expired certificate and has not been renewed, the expired certificate data will be shown.   If a new *active* certificate has been registered for a property, only that certificate data will be shown.   If there are no certificates for a property, there will be no data element for that property/address.

404.description: Contains an error "code" and "message" which describes the issue.   *code* is a constant, *message* gives more details.

get.description:
Fetches the following census related data for the given *area_code_postal*:
  - Demographics
  - Housing
  - Indicators

404.description: Contains an error "code" and "message" which describes the issue.   *code* is a constant, *message* gives more details.

get.description: Fetches the nearest amenities for the given *area_code_postal*: - Railway Station - Tube DLR Station - Primary School - Secondary School - General Practitioner - Dentist - Hospital - Opticians

ApiKeyAuth.name: X-Auth-Token
ApiKeyAuth.description: API key obtained from the ScanSan sign up site

class_definition.examples: Output Area falls within a built-up area with a population of 10,000 or more and is assigned to the major conurbation settlement category. The wider surrounding area is less sparsely populated

regeneration_description.examples: The Northumberland Park Regeneration project is a significant initiative aimed at enhancing the quality of life in the Northumberland Park area. By constructing new homes, improving public spaces, and upgrading local amenities, the project seeks to address the housing needs and infrastructure deficiencies in the community. As part of the broader North Tottenham regeneration scheme, this project contributes to the overall revitalization of the region.
